target.name: Procedure
target.text: Access the Time Off Requests discussion forum.

target.name: Step
target.text: Access the Time Off Requests discussion forum.

target.name: Step
target.text: Scroll to the "Customize commands and workflows in this forum" section and click Develop workflow processes.

target.name: Step
target.text: If you have existing workflow processes in this discussion forum, you must click the Add a workflow link on the toolbar to create a new workflow process (if you have no other existing workflow processes, skip this step).

target.name: Step
target.text: In the "Workflow name" text box in the working area of the page, enter the workflow name.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To add states to the Time Off Request workflow process:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click Add or delete states, or modify the initial state from the list of workflow tools.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Add or delete states, or modify the initial state from the list of workflow tools.

target.name: Step
target.text: When the "Add or delete states, or modify the initial state" form appears in the working area of the page, enter one state name on each line.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Create Transition from Submit State to Review State

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Using the flowchart, click the Submit oval.

target.name: Step
target.text: Using the flowchart, click the Submit oval.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Add or delete transitions tool in the "Edit the current state" section.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the "to cause a transition to:" list, click Review.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Add transition and close button.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To create two manual transitions from Review:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the flowchart, click the oval for the Review state.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the flowchart, click the oval for the Review state.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the "Edit the current state" tools, click Add or delete transitions.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the "Select the conditions that must be true:" list, click Manual transition (group 1).

target.name: Step
target.text: In the "to cause a transition to:" list click Approve.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Add transition and continue button.

target.name: Step
target.text: Once the window refreshes, click Manual transition (group 1), and then click Deny.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Add transition and close button.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: Create a manual transition from Approve to Record:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click on the Approve oval in the flowchart.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click on the Approve oval in the flowchart.

target.name: Step
target.text: Once the "Add or delete transition" form appears, click Manual transition (group 1) and then click Record.

target.name: Step
target.text: Go to the Time Off Requests discussion forum.

target.name: Step
target.text: Add a discussion topic using the Add menu option.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type in the information and click OK.

target.name: Step
target.text: On the toolbar, click Tools, and click Initiate a workflow process.

target.name: Step
target.text: On the form that appears, click the radio button next to the name of the Time Off Request workflow process, then click OK.

target.name: Step
target.text: To test the transitions, make sure that the "Change state to:" drop-down list is set to Review, and click OK.

target.name: Step
target.text: View the top folder of the discussion forum by clicking on the linked folder title toward the top of the entry.
